name: testecho
description: This plugin is used only to test Kaholo functionality.

params.name: authString01
params.description: Leave this unconfigured

params.name: authString02
params.viewName: Auth String 02 - with config.json default value
params.description: This should default to "defaulted" without being configured

params.name: authString03
params.description: Configure this to something as a user

params.name: authText01
params.description: Leave this unconfigured

params.name: authText02
params.viewName: Auth Text 02 - with config.json default value
params.description: This should default to "defaulted=true\nlines=2" without being configured

params.name: authText03
params.description: Configure this to something as a user

params.name: authVault01
params.description: Leave this unconfigured

params.name: authVault02
params.viewName: Auth Vault 02 - user configured, NOT required
params.description: This is not required

params.name: authVault03
params.description: Configure this to something as a user

settings.name: settingString02
settings.viewName: Setting String 02 - with config.json default value
settings.description: This should default to "defaulted" without being configured

settings.name: settingString03
settings.description: Configure this to something as a user

settings.name: settingText02
settings.viewName: Setting Text 02 - with config.json default value
settings.description: This should default to "defaulted=true\nlines=2" without being configured

settings.name: settingText03
settings.description: Configure this to something as a user

settings.name: settingVault02
settings.description: This setting is not required, but as param it is required

settings.name: settingVault03
settings.description: Configure this to something as a user

methods.name: testStringBasic
methods.viewName: Test String Params, Settings, and Accounts

params.name: testRunName
params.description: Any string to identify this test run

params.name: paramString01
params.description: Leave this unconfigured

params.name: paramString02
params.viewName: Param String 02 - with config.json default value
params.description: This should default to "defaulted" without being configured

params.name: paramString03
params.description: Configure this to something as a user

methods.name: testTextBasic
methods.viewName: Test Text Params, Settings, and Accounts

params.name: testRunName
params.description: Any string to identify this test run

params.name: paramText01
params.description: Leave this unconfigured

params.name: paramText02
params.viewName: Param Text 02 - with config.json default value
params.description: This should default to "defaulted=true\nlines=2" without being configured

params.name: paramText03
params.description: Configure this to something as a user

methods.name: testVaultBasic
methods.viewName: Test Vault Params, Settings, and Accounts

params.name: testRunName
params.description: Any string to identify this test run

params.name: paramVault01
params.description: Leave this unconfigured

params.name: paramVault02
params.viewName: Param Vault 02 - required although setting is not
params.description: This parameter is required

params.name: paramVault03
params.description: Configure this to something as a user
